content: MT-C-LDP L1 OC Angle connector Angle connector for assembling strut channels structure or channel with Load Distribution Plate, for outdoor use with low pollution ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Part of the Hilti MT system – an economical, all-in-one solution for virtually all modular MEP support structures Easy to install – compatible with the Hilti MT Twist-Lock, MQM and MRN Channel Nuts, a faster alternative to spring nuts for assembling a modular support system Vertical channel can be inclined up to 7-degrees for compensation of roof pitch Connector with channel can be inclined up to 10-degrees for compensation of roof pitch Applications Fastening connections between two strut channels or one channel and Load Distribution Plate Perfectly suitable for outdoor applications ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Q235 or better steel Surface finish: Outdoor Coated - HDG Material thickness: 4 mm Technical Data | Material composition | Q235 or better steel | Surface finish | Outdoor Coated - HDG | Material thickness | 4 mm | Environmental conditions | Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) ### ITEMS- 2320180 - Connector MT-C-LDP L1 OC - Package Size 8 pc
